SELECT t.g_category ,t.tmplt_nm ,isnull(t.bkg_no, '') AS bkg_no ,t.hbl_no ,t.mbl_no ,t.current_step ,t.next_step
, CASE WHEN max_jb_pln_dt_tm >= max_jb_act_dt_tm THEN 'green' ELSE 'red' END AS job_status ,CASE WHEN FLOOR(t.dur_tm_qty/ 8) > 0 AND (t.dur_tm_qty % 8) > 0 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR,FLOOR(t.dur_tm_qty / 8)) + 'days ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,(t.dur_tm_qty % 8)) + 'Hours' WHEN FLOOR(t.dur_tm_qty / 8) > 0 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR,FLOOR(t.dur_tm_qty / 8)) + 'days' WHEN (t.dur_tm_qty % 8) > 0 THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR,(t.dur_tm_qty % 8)) + 'Hours' ELSE '' END AS dur_tm_qty ,t.intg_bl_seq ,t.mx_seq ,t.bkg_dt_tm ,t.jb_pln_dt_tm ,t.jb_act_dt_tm ,t.jb_plan_dt_tm_cp ,t.jb_act_dt_tm_cp ,t.modi_ofc_cd FROM (SELECT (SELECT cd_nm FROM tb_com_cd_dtl WHERE com_cd = 'C021' AND cd_val = a.lg_clss_biz_cd) AS g_category , a.tmplt_nm AS tmplt_nm , d.bkg_no AS bkg_no , d.bl_no AS hbl_no , (SELECT f.bl_no FROM tb_intg_bl f, tb_intg_bl_rlt g WHERE f.intg_bl_seq = g.rlt_intg_bl_seq AND g.intg_bl_seq = d.intg_bl_seq) AS mbl_no , (SELECT h.cd_nm FROM tb_com_cd_dtl h WHERE h.cd_val = c.jb_sts_cd AND h.com_cd = (CASE WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'AI' THEN 'C065' WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'AO' THEN 'C064' WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'SI' THEN 'C063' WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'SO' THEN 'C062' END)) AS current_step , (SELECT h.cd_nm FROM tb_com_cd_dtl h WHERE h.cd_val = (select c2.jb_sts_cd from tb_wrk_flow c2 where c2.intg_bl_seq = c.intg_bl_seq and c2.srt_seq = c.srt_seq+1) AND h.com_cd = (CASE WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'AI' THEN 'C065' WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'AO' THEN 'C064' WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'SI' THEN 'C063' WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'SO' THEN 'C062' END)) AS next_step , CASE WHEN c.jb_pln_dt_tm >= isnull(c.jb_act_dt_tm, getdate()) THEN 'green' ELSE 'red' END AS job_status ,SUM(ISNULL(b.dur_tm_qty, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY d.intg_bl_seq) AS dur_tm_qty , MAX(ISNULL(c.srt_seq, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY d.intg_bl_seq) AS max_srt_seq , d.intg_bl_seq , c.srt_seq AS mx_seq , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), d.bl_iss_dt,121) AS bkg_dt_tm , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), c.jb_pln_dt_tm,121) AS jb_pln_dt_tm , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), c.jb_act_dt_tm,121) AS jb_act_dt_tm , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), c.jb_pln_dt_tm,121) AS jb_plan_dt_tm_cp , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), c.jb_act_dt_tm,121) AS jb_act_dt_tm_cp , f.sls_usrid AS modi_ofc_cd , (select top 1 t2.jb_pln_dt_tm from tb_wrk_flow t2 where t2.intg_bl_seq = c.intg_bl_seq order by t2.srt_seq desc) as max_jb_pln_dt_tm , (select top 1 isnull(t3.jb_act_dt_tm, getdate()) from tb_wrk_flow t3 where t3.intg_bl_seq = c.intg_bl_seq order by t3.srt_seq desc) as max_jb_act_dt_tm ,ISNULL((select c2.jb_sts_cd from tb_wrk_flow c2 where c2.intg_bl_seq = c.intg_bl_seq and c2.srt_seq = c.srt_seq+1) , c.jb_sts_cd) AS next_jb_sts_cd ,c.jb_sts_cd FROM tb_jb_tmplt a, tb_jb_tmplt_list b, tb_wrk_flow c, tb_intg_bl d LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT INTG_BL_SEQ AS INTG_BL_SEQ1, BL_STS_CD AS BL_STS_CD1 FROM TB_INTG_BL_BLCK) BLCK ON D.INTG_BL_SEQ = BLCK.INTG_BL_SEQ1, tb_add_info_bnd f WHERE 1=1 AND c.intg_bl_seq = d.intg_bl_seq AND d.intg_bl_seq = f.intg_bl_seq AND f.jb_tmplt_seq = a.jb_tmplt_seq AND a.jb_tmplt_seq = b.jb_tmplt_seq AND b.bl_sts_cd = c.jb_sts_cd AND a.lg_clss_biz_cd = #s_Category# AND f.bnd_clss_cd = #bnd_clss_cd#
a.jb_tmplt_seq = #s_TemplateList#
ISNULL(BLCK.BL_STS_CD1, D.BL_STS_CD) != 'HF'
d.bl_iss_dt BETWEEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), #s_recvDt_fm#,121) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), #s_recvDt_to#,121)
f.modi_ofc_cd = #ofc_cd_in#
) t WHERE t.mx_seq = (SELECT MAX(t2.srt_seq) FROM tb_wrk_flow t2 WHERE t2.intg_bl_seq = t.intg_bl_seq AND ISNULL(t2.jb_act_dt_tm, '') != '')
max_jb_pln_dt_tm < max_jb_act_dt_tm
t.jb_sts_cd = #s_CurrentStep#
ORDER BY t.tmplt_nm

SELECT A.intg_bl_seq ,A.bl_sts_cd ,A.jb_sts_cd ,A.srt_seq ,A.jb_pln_dt_tm ,A.jb_act_dt_tm ,A.rgst_usrid ,A.modi_usrid ,B.cd_nm
FROM tb_wrk_flow A, tb_com_cd_dtl B WHERE A.intg_bl_seq = #intg_bl_seq# AND A.bl_sts_cd = B.cd_val AND A.bnd_clss_cd = #bnd_clss_cd# AND B.com_cd = 'C004' ORDER BY A.srt_seq

SELECT c.cd_nm, b.tmplt_nm, b.descr, a.dur_tm_qty, (SELECT eng_usr_nm FROM tb_usr WHERE usr_tp = 'I' AND usrid = a.rgst_usrid ) AS rgst_usrid, a.rgst_tms, (SELECT eng_usr_nm FROM tb_usr WHERE usr_tp = 'I' AND usrid = a.modi_usrid ) AS modi_usrid, a.modi_tms, (SELECT ofc_eng_nm FROM tb_ofc WHERE ofc_cd = a.rgst_ofc_cd ) AS rgst_ofc_cd FROM tb_jb_tmplt_list a, tb_jb_tmplt b , tb_com_cd_dtl c WHERE a.jb_tmplt_seq = #template_code# AND a.jb_tmplt_seq = b.jb_tmplt_seq AND c.com_cd ='C021' AND b.lg_clss_biz_cd = c.cd_val AND a.delt_flg = 'N' ORDER BY a.srt_seq

SELECT (SELECT cd_nm FROM tb_com_cd_dtl WHERE com_cd = 'C021' AND cd_val = a.lg_clss_biz_cd) AS category , a.tmplt_nm AS template , CASE WHEN f.bnd_clss_cd = 'I' THEN 'INBOUND' WHEN f.bnd_clss_cd = 'O' THEN 'OUTBOUND' END AS bnd_clss_cd , d.bkg_no AS bkg_no , d.bl_no AS hbl_no , (SELECT f.bl_no FROM tb_intg_bl f, tb_intg_bl_rlt g WHERE f.intg_bl_seq = g.rlt_intg_bl_seq AND g.intg_bl_seq = d.intg_bl_seq) AS mbl_no , d.sr_no , ISNULL(BLCK.BL_STS_CD1, D.BL_STS_CD) AS BL_STS_CD , c.jb_sts_cd
, DATEADD(HOUR, ISNULL(b.dur_tm_qty,0), getdate()) AS curr_tm , CASE WHEN c.jb_pln_dt_tm >= isnull(c.jb_act_dt_tm, getdate()) THEN 'green' ELSE 'red' END AS sts_color , d.intg_bl_seq , c.srt_seq , (SELECT h.cd_nm FROM tb_com_cd_dtl h WHERE h.cd_val = c.jb_sts_cd AND h.com_cd = (CASE WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'AI' THEN 'C065' WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'AO' THEN 'C064' WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'SI' THEN 'C063' WHEN a.lg_clss_biz_cd = 'SO' THEN 'C062' END)) AS cd_nm , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), d.bl_iss_dt,121) AS recv_dt , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), c.jb_pln_dt_tm,121) AS jb_pln_dt_tm , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), c.jb_act_dt_tm,121) AS jb_act_dt_tm , c.rgst_usrid , CASE WHEN c.jb_act_dt_tm is null THEN null ELSE c.modi_usrid END AS modi_usrid FROM tb_jb_tmplt a, tb_jb_tmplt_list b, tb_wrk_flow c, tb_intg_bl d LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT INTG_BL_SEQ AS INTG_BL_SEQ1, BL_STS_CD AS BL_STS_CD1 FROM TB_INTG_BL_BLCK) BLCK ON D.INTG_BL_SEQ = BLCK.INTG_BL_SEQ1, tb_add_info_bnd f WHERE 1=1 AND c.intg_bl_seq = #intg_bl_seq# AND c.intg_bl_seq = d.intg_bl_seq AND d.intg_bl_seq = f.intg_bl_seq AND f.jb_tmplt_seq = a.jb_tmplt_seq AND a.jb_tmplt_seq = b.jb_tmplt_seq AND b.bl_sts_cd = c.jb_sts_cd ORDER BY c.srt_seq
